title: Bug 40012Legacy EL Support not resolving variables correctly
description: Given the following page:<% pageContext.setAttribute("t", "foo"); %${t}<%out.print(pageContext.getExpressionEvaluator().evaluate("${t}",String.class,pageContext.getVariableResolver(),null));%You will notice that the ${t} prints out fine when in the JSP but does notresolve using the scriplet and prints nothing.For a sanity check, I tested this and it worked in glassfish to ensure I wasn'tdoing anything odd.I'm trying to find root cause; but haven't found it yet, so I'm logging it incase anyone else has the itch to scratch.
